attributes.action: Cut knife related deaths with immediate imprisonment for possessing a knife/pointed/bladed article without lawful excuse, for first time offenders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time to actually jail youngsters and not threaten to do it, for carrying a knife in a public, for a miniumum of 5 years even for a first offence. Anyone caught in possession of a knife or pointed/bladed article without lawful excuse/authority will be imprisoned. This is to send out a very clear message to young people about the consequences of carrying search weapons.
